name: A-Lone
description:
A - Lone is a simple  Top-down shooter game made for 3 day Zeno Jam 5,  You Lost at a unknow planet you don't know that something lurking in the dark that  attracted to the light, Can You survive with your limited vision.

Controls: use W,A,S,D or Arrow keys

Shoot: use mouse to aim and shoot.

Ammo Creates spawn every seconds.
